overview: The original classic on video, which introduces Gabrielle Roth's revolutionary system of moving meditation. Teaches how five core rhythms can teach, catalyze, and heal our entire being.
tagline: This is a revolutionary moving meditation through the 5RhythmsÂ®. This flexible dance workout adapts to your energy and your schedule, while you explore these core rhythms and their capacity to teach, catalyze and heal.
title: The Wave
